intro: Psychotria sogerensis, commonly known as the Sogerén’s Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Ecuador and Peru. The plant is characterized by its elliptical leaves and small, clustered white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical forests. Psychotria sogerensis is also known for its potential ethnobotanical uses among indigenous communities.
